languages.text: {n}Рисунки невольников были слишком... системны. Они не могли быть абсурдной бессмыслицей — слишком одинаковы были повторяющиеся в них наборы точек и черт. Но если это был язык, то изобрел его, судя по сложности и невозможности расшифровки, явно не каторжник.{/n}

{n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рисунки невольников были слишком... системны. Они не могли быть абсурдной бессмыслицей — слишком одинаковы были повторяющиеся в них наборы точек и черт. Но если это был язык, то изобрел его, судя по сложности и невозможности расшифровки, явно не каторжник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of the repeating elements of the dashes and dots are too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by the complexity and the impossibility of decoding, it definitely has not been created by a convict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些囚犯的涂鸦实在是有些……过于有条理了。这些符号不可能仅仅是简单的乱涂乱画，因为划线和圆点的重复元素非常相似。不过，如果它确实是某种暗号的话，就它的复杂性和难以破解的特性来看，这种暗号肯定不是某个囚犯创造出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些囚犯的涂鸦实在是有些……过于有条理了。这些符号不可能仅仅是简单的乱涂乱画，因为划线和圆点的重复元素非常相似。不过，如果它确实是某种暗号的话，就它的复杂性和难以破解的特性来看，这种暗号肯定不是某个囚犯创造出来的。{/n}
{n}那些囚犯的涂鸦……很有系统。这些符号不可能仅仅是简单的胡言乱语，因为划线和圆点的重复元素实在是过于相似。不过，如果它确实是某种暗号的话，就它的复杂性和无法破解的特性来看，这种语言肯定不是某个囚犯创造出来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los dibujos de los prisioneros eran demasiado... sistemáticos. No podía tratarse de simple locura: las repetidas combinaciones de líneas y puntos eran demasiado similares. Pero, si se trataba de un código secreto, su complejidad y la imposibilidad de decodificarlo demostraban que no era invención de ningún convicto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dibujos de los prisioneros eran demasiado... sistemáticos. No podía tratarse de simple locura: las repetidas combinaciones de líneas y puntos eran demasiado similares. Pero, si se trataba de un código secreto, su complejidad y la imposibilidad de decodificarlo demostraban que no era invención de ningún convicto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人たちの絵はあまりにも...きちょうめんだった。単にわけが分からないというわけではない...線と点の繰り返し要素があまりにも類似している。しかし、もしそれが本当に秘密の暗号だとすれば、その複雑さと解読の不可能さから判断して、その言語は間違いなく囚人が作り出したものではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人たちの絵はあまりにも...きちょうめんだった。単にわけが分からないというわけではない...線と点の繰り返し要素があまりにも類似している。しかし、もしそれが本当に秘密の言語だとすれば、その複雑さと解読の不可能さから判断して、その言語は間違いなく囚人が作り出したものではない。{/n}
{n}囚人たちの絵はあまりにも...きちょうめんだった。単にわけが分からないというわけではない...線と点の繰り返し要素があまりにも類似している。しかし、もしそれが本当に秘密の言語だとすれば、その複雑さと解読の不可能さから判断して、その言語は間違いなく囚人が作り出したものではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les dessins des détenus sont... trop récurrents, il ne peut s'agir de simples gribouillages. Les ensembles répétitifs de traits et de points... tout cela est trop similaire d'un dessin à l'autre. Si c'est effectivement un code secret, alors d'après sa complexité et l'impossibilité de le déchiffrer, il n'a pas été inventé par un détenu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}

Les ensembles répétitifs de traits et de points... tout cela est trop similaire d'un dessin à l'autre. Si c'est effectivement un code secret, alors d'après sa complexité et l'impossibilité de le déchiffrer, il n'a pas été inventé par un détenu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeichnungen der Gefangenen waren zu ... systematisch. Sie konnten kein Unfug sein ... dazu waren die sich wiederholenden Striche und Punkte zu ähnlich. Wenn sie aber tatsächlich ein geheimer Code waren, waren sie angesichts ihrer Komplexität und der Unmöglichkeit, sie zu entschlüsseln, gewiss nicht von einem Sträfling entwickelt worden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeichnungen der Gefangenen waren zu ... systematisch. Sie konnten kein Unfug sein ... dazu waren die sich wiederholenden Striche und Punkte zu ähnlich. Wenn sie aber tatsächlich ein geheimer Code waren, waren sie angesichts ihrer Komplexität und der Unmöglichkeit, sie zu entschlüsseln, gewiss nicht von einem Sträfling entwickelt worden.{/n}

{n}Die Zeichnungen der Gefangenen waren zu ... systematisch. Sie konnten nicht einfach wirres Zeug sein. Die sich wiederholenden Elemente der Linien und Punkte waren sich einfach zu ähnlich. Wenn es aber tatsächlich eine Geheimsprache war, dann war sie ob ihrer Komplexität und der Unmöglichkeit, sie zu entschlüsseln, gewiss nicht von einem Sträfling entwickelt worden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahkûmların çizimleri... Aşırı sistematikti. Zırvadan ibaret olma ihtimalleri yoktu, tekrar eden çizgiler ve noktalar fazlasıyla benzerdi. Bu sahiden gizli bir kodsa da karmaşıklığı ve deşifre edilmesinin imkânsızlığı sebebiyle bir mahkûmun elinden çıkmış olamazdı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners' drawings were too... systematic. They could not be mere gibberish — the sets of repeating dashes and dots were far too similar. But if it was indeed a secret code, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, this language was definitely not invented by a convict.{/n}
